content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a person named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main point of disagreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main point of disagreement was the rental price. The landlord was looking for a price higher than 625 Euro per month, which was the highest I was willing to pay.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am not satisfied with the outcome. The scale does not apply in this case as we did not reach an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo
